bibl.title: William Clark, Michael, and Anson v. Henry Mitchell, Henry Russell and Elijah Mitchell. Copy of Order of the Judge Permitting Suit
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

keywords.term: Third Judicial Circuit State of Missouri

org.orgName: Third Judicial Circuit State of Missouri

div1.p: Copy of the order of the Judge permitting plaintiff to institute suit

The above petitioners are allowed to institute a suit on the foregoing petition to establish their right to freedom & the Clerk of the Circuit Court for StLouis County is hereby directed to issue a writ according to the statue in such case made & provided - It is also ordered that the said petitioners be not subject to any severity on account of their application for freedom - that they have reasonable liberty of attending their counsel & the court whenever occasion may require and that they be not removed out of the Jurisdiction of the Court - Given under my hand as Judge of the third Judicial Circuit State of Missouri at Chambers this 23 May 1832 - Will. C. Carr
A true copy of the order
